Text:
@all
in fact 
loog ab mujh se **seema, darling darling,madhubala 1950,simla road,anjan hai koi aur is kisam ki movies ki request karte hain aap batayen mein kya karon,
LATEST MAIL FROM UAE.
Dear Malikjee,
There's not a day that I don't visit your link in Pirate bay. Since I am in the UAE, I don't seem to be able to register myself in that site and hence am not able to put my comments or requests there. Thank god!!! you had put your email id in one of the comments. Thanks for all the rare movies that u've uploaded... have collected each and every one of them. Keep going... really appreciate your sincerity. 
I am in the look out for 2 rare movies.... both Devanand movies.... one is Darling Darling and the other is Madhubala. If you have them can u pls upload these movies?
Waiting for ur reply
Thanks again
Regards
Vijayan
ab mein kya karon agar upload karta hoon tu aap hi kahein ge masala movie hai na upload karein agar nahi karta tu req karne waly ka dil toot jaiga 
kaise dil jaiten aap ka aap hi bata dein koi raasta....
thanks

DEAR MALIKJEE. YOUR PREDICAMENT IS UNDERSTANDABLE, BUT WHAT THE HELL! WE DONT WANT MASALA MOVIES. PLS UPLOAD ONLY THE ARTIE MOVS ONLY. AND ITS NOT THAT THE GENESIS WAS NOT NOTED. I DOWNLOADED IT BUT WAS DEEPLY DISAPPOINTED TO CHECK THAT IT WAS ONLY 30 MINS. BUT I DIDNT COMMENT BACK FOR THAT ONLY OUT OF COURTESY, SINCE I DIDNT WANT TO B PERCEIVED A THANKLESS AND COMPLAINING IRRITANT. HOWEVER, NOW SINCE U HAVE RAISED IT, I WUD LIKE TO SAY THAT IF U DONT TAKE IT OTHERWISE, PLS DONT UPLOAD SAMPLES OR HALFS SINCE THATS ONLY A WASTE OF BANDWIDTH AND TIME. OR ELSE, PLS MAKE A MENTION THAT ITS A HALF. THERE WAS 1 MORE MOVIE LIKE THAT IN WHICH END 20 MINS WAS MISSING....CANT RECALL NAME....A SRIRAM LAGOO ONE...IN WHICH HE AS A WOMANISER. AND ONCE AGAIN A LOTTS OF THANKS AND GRATITUDE FOR ALL YOUR OFFERINGS. I LOVED THAT MOST RECENT UPLOAD PET PYAR AUR PAAP.
RGDS - LOVEPAREEK.

malikjee ,now that you have been uploading Serials and that too rare ones,I hope you could upload these old ones-
1)Mungerilal ke Haseen Sapney(Raghubeer Yadav)
2)Ye Jo Hai Zindagi (Shafi Inamdar).

@@ Dear Malik Saheb , 

aap art cinema ko jinda rakhne aur chupe hue khajane ko hum sab logon me baatne ke liye mashoor hai. Jo filme  gart ke andhero me padi thi un sab rarest movies ko aapne hum sab tak free me pahunchaya, Aap ki di hui saugat humne kabhi sapne me bhi nahin sochi thi , Is sab ke liye hum aapke ehsaanmand aur shukrgujar hai. we are very fortunate for being associated with you. 

Hum to khair art cinema wale log hai saheb , par main to yahi keh sakta hoon wahi kijiyaga jo aapka dil kahe . 

after all you are very important for us and will always be remembered  for your free courtesy.

dear malik saab aap to genius hai aapse bada khazana maine aaj tak nahin dekha, mujhe seema (kabir bedi , simi) aur dev anand ki darling darling ki barso se talash hai plz agar aap in 2 filmo ko upload kar sake to aapka zindagi bhar shukragujar rahunga

malik sahib.....aap sab ki request ka jawaab dete hain par mere tak aap ka koi bhi jawaab nahin aaya maine aapse ek movie ki request ki thi "Tarpan" please upload this rare gem as soon as posible.....i will be very thankful to you
SIRJEE,,MERE KHAYAL MAI AAP HAMARE ARTFILMS KE MASSEHA HO LEKIN AAPKO AGAR KOI BHI FILM UPLOAD KARNA HAI TO AAP WO KAREIN..ISME KISI KO KOI AITRAAZ NAHI HONA CHAHIYE
